title: Need Mid Laner sub Plat+
body:
need an mid laner to sub in for an upcoming scrims on friday all night and saturday morning. If you can make the time and rank requirment plz add me and i will fill you in with our lineup, comp and details.

Requirements:
-Wide Champion Pool 
-Plays Mids
-Plat+
-teamspeak and skype
-non-toxic

if interested add me or post below

Cheers, Mickawesome

replies.body:
I can play most mid lane champions but these ones i play mostly {{champion:34}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:103}}. i don't prefer to play {{champion:7}} {{champion:131}} (they aren't my play style) 
Plat 4 with Skype happy to fill in for you.
